dashboard.label: Maschinen Überwachung
dashboard.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_nmHHOlIO":{"type":"splunk.choropleth.svg","options":{"svg":"http://localhost:8000/de-DE/static/app/Saegewerk/saegewerk.svg","backgroundColor":"#363D45"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_bqpvjBe7"}},"viz_aSdyifjZ":{"type":"splunk.table","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_yalacyPx"},"title":"Aktueller Auftrag","options":{"backgroundColor":"transparent","tableFormat":{"rowBackgroundColors":"> table | seriesByIndex(0) | pick(tableAltRowBackgroundColorsByBackgroundColor)","headerBackgroundColor":"> backgroundColor | setColorChannel(tableHeaderBackgroundColorConfig)","rowColors":"> rowBackgroundColors | maxContrast(tableRowColorMaxContrast)","headerColor":"> headerBackgroundColor | maxContrast(tableRowColorMaxContrast)"},"showRowNumbers":true}},"viz_5oBvXdN0":{"type":"viz.pie","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_fXzkP0uQ"},"title":"Anteil Holzsorten","options":{"chart.showPercent":true,"chart.sliceCollapsingThreshold":1,"backgroundColor":"transparent"}},"viz_ZT61Dnyc":{"type":"viz.markergauge","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_ig9ZgkDY"},"title":"Temperatur Gamma","options":{"ranges":[{"from":60,"value":"#CB3B43","to":80},{"from":40,"value":"#F4DF7A","to":60},{"from":20,"value":"#4BEBA8","to":40}],"backgroundColor":"transparent"}},"viz_AbP6qqQd":{"type":"viz.markergauge","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_mSptfIg5_ds_ig9ZgkDY"},"title":"Temperatur Beta","options":{"ranges":[{"from":60,"value":"#CB3B43","to":80},{"from":40,"value":"#F4DF7A","to":60},{"from":20,"value":"#4BEBA8","to":40}],"backgroundColor":"transparent"}},"viz_v0UXmJHc":{"type":"viz.markergauge","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_QrNc5IRH_ds_mSptfIg5_ds_ig9ZgkDY"},"title":"Temperatur Alpha","options":{"ranges":[{"from":60,"value":"#CB3B43","to":80},{"from":40,"value":"#F4DF7A","to":60},{"from":20,"value":"#4BEBA8","to":40}],"backgroundColor":"transparent"}},"viz_V0f9MRPM":{"type":"viz.area","options":{"legend.placement":"bottom","chart.nullValueMode":"connect","axisTitleX.text":"Zeit","axisTitleY.text":"Anzahl","backgroundColor":"transparent"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_QTGYdPpW"}}},"dataSources":{"ds_bqpvjBe7":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("Bieberbau.alpha.Temperatur") prestats=true WHERE "index"="maschinen" span=10s
| timechart avg("Bieberbau.alpha.Temperatur") AS "alpha" span=10s
| fields - _span*
| append [
| mstats avg("Spechtnest.beta.Temperatur") prestats=true WHERE "index"="maschinen" span=10s
| timechart avg("Spechtnest.beta.Temperatur") AS "beta" span=10s
| fields - _span*
]
| selfjoin keepsingle=true _time
| append [
| mstats avg("Spechtnest.gamma.Temperatur") prestats=true WHERE "index"="maschinen" span=10s
| timechart avg("Spechtnest.gamma.Temperatur") AS "gamma" span=10s
| fields - _span*
]
| selfjoin keepsingle=true _time
| stats last(alpha) as alpha , last(beta) as beta, last(gamma) as gamma
| transpose
| rename column as machine, "row 1" as temp","refresh":"10s"},"name":"Temperaturen"},"ds_yalacyPx":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=auftrag
| stats last(Umsatz) as Umsatz,last(Kunde) as Kunde,last(Gewicht) as Gewicht by Maschine","refresh":"10s"},"name":"Aktueller Auftrag"},"ds_fXzkP0uQ":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=auftrag
| stats count by Holz","refresh":"10s"},"name":"Holzsorten"},"ds_ig9ZgkDY":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("Spechtnest.gamma.Temperatur") as Temp prestats=false WHERE "index"="maschinen" span=10s
| stats last(Temp) as Temp","refresh":"10s"},"name":"Temp Gamma"},"ds_mSptfIg5_ds_ig9ZgkDY":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("Spechtnest.beta.Temperatur") as Temp prestats=false WHERE "index"="maschinen" span=10s
| stats last(Temp) as Temp","refresh":"10s"},"name":"Copy of Temp Gamma"},"ds_QrNc5IRH_ds_mSptfIg5_ds_ig9ZgkDY":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| mstats avg("Bieberbau.alpha.Temperatur") as Temp prestats=false WHERE "index"="maschinen" span=10s
| stats last(Temp) as Temp","refresh":"10s"},"name":"Copy of Copy of Temp Gamma"},"ds_QTGYdPpW":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=auftrag Maschine IN ($tok_maschine$)
| timechart count by Maschine","refresh":"10s"},"name":"Anzahl Aufträge"},"ds_Filtersuche_Maschine":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=auftrag
| table Maschine
| dedup Maschine"},"name":"Filtersuche_Maschine"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"-15m,now"},"title":"Globale Zeitspanne"},"input_9hpN151c":{"options":{"items":[{"label":"Alle","value":"*"}],"defaultValue":"*","token":"tok_maschine"},"encoding":{"label":"primary[0]","value":"primary[0]"},"dataSources":{"primary":"Filtersuche_Maschine"},"title":"Maschinenauswahl","type":"input.multiselect"}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale"},"structure":[{"item":"viz_nmHHOlIO","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":100,"w":1200,"h":750}},{"item":"viz_V0f9MRPM","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":390,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_aSdyifjZ","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":710,"w":610,"h":170}},{"item":"viz_5oBvXdN0","type":"block","position":{"x":870,"y":20,"w":320,"h":300}},{"item":"viz_ZT61Dnyc","type":"block","position":{"x":290,"y":180,"w":200,"h":230}},{"item":"viz_AbP6qqQd","type":"block","position":{"x":480,"y":130,"w":200,"h":230}},{"item":"viz_v0UXmJHc","type":"block","position":{"x":660,"y":80,"w":200,"h":230}}],"globalInputs":["input_global_trp","input_9hpN151c"]},"description":"","title":"Maschinen Überwachung"}
